SEARCH
Package org.jboss.resteasy.utils

Class PortProviderUtil

java.lang.Object
org.jboss.resteasy.utils.PortProviderUtil
public class PortProviderUtil extends Object
Utility class that provides a port number for the Resteasy embedded container.

      Throws:

      public static int findOpenPort(int minPort)

      Parameters:
      minPort - the minimum port number to attempt
      Returns:
      the available port
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if no port is available
